question: Who is the First Woman In The World To Take 200 ODI Wickets?
explanation: Indian women's cricket team pacer Jhulan Goswami become the first woman in the world to take 200 wickets in ODI cricket. Goswami achieved the feat playing in her 166th ODI against South Africa. Goswami had become the leading wicket-taker in women's ODI in May 2017, overtaking former Australian pacer Cathryn Fitzpatrick's record of 180 wickets.
